title: finefile.toml
description: Definition of benchmark commands and outputs

cleanup.description: A command to run after each set of timing runs. Executes once per benchmarked command.

conclude.description: A command to run after each timing run.

env.description: Environment variables used when executing commands.

additionalProperties.description: The value of an environment variable used when executing commands.

export-json.description: A file path to write benchmark results to.

prepare.description: A command to run before each timing run.

setup.description: A command to run before each set of timing runs. Executes once per benchmarked command.

shell.description: The shell to use for executing commands.

tags.description: Tags can be used to include or exclude commands.

warmup-runs.description: The number of warmup runs to perform before timing runs.

commands.description: Default values used when a value is not set for commands.<name>

plots.description: Plots to create from benchmark results.

additionalProperties.description: A plot to create from benchmark results.

file.description: A file path to write the plot image to.

type.description: The type of plot to create.
